summary: This bill, the Tailored Regulatory Updates for Supervisory Testing Act of 2025 (TRUST Act of 2025), amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act. It aims to modify examination cycle thresholds for well-managed insured depository institutions. Specifically, it would allow federal banking agencies to examine qualifying institutions with under $6 billion in total assets not less than once every 18 months, effectively increasing the examination threshold from $3 billion.
